Bi2-hong5 sun7-goeh8 liau2-au7 goa2 chiah khai-si2 sio2-khoa2 e7 kin2-tiunn. Chu7 kin-ni5 7 goeh8-te2, Bi2-hong5 ui3 Tai5-oan5 tng2 lai5 Jit8-pun2 liau2-au7 to7 khah be7 penn7-kiann2--a, Gi5-lian5 ma7 tauh8-tauh8-a2 koan3-si3 po2-iok8-hng5 e5 seng-oah8, kau tioh8 chit8-koa2 sin peng5-iu2, hou7 goan2 2 e5 cho3 pe7-bo2--e5, e7-sai2 khah an-sim tan2-thai7 te7-ji7 e5 gin2-a2 lai5 kau3 se3-kan.

時間tauh8-tauh8-a2 oa2近，美虹e5腹tou2猶原吊koan5-koan5，1-sut-a2都無chhe7低e5現象，厝頭家a婆kian3-pai2看tioh8 i，long2會ka7唸--2-句-a2，講tioh8-ai3 khah kut-lat8行--leh，gin2-a2 chiah會khah好生； 保育園hit-koa2 chhoa7 gin2-a2 chhoa7出趣味e5 ou-ba2-sang2，koh-khah對i e5腹tou2有趣味，tak8-pai2若看tioh8美虹，一定會問講，iau2 koh joa7久chiah beh生，續--落-來，koh來ka7美虹e5腹tou2摸摸so-so--leh chiah甘願，連hit kui2 e5老師ma7 kang7款，害goa2 tiann7-tiann7 khia7 ti7邊--a2，m7知是ai3 chhap嘴ah是mai3 chiah好。

Si5-kan tauh8-tauh8-a2 oa2-kin7, Bi2-hong5 e5 pak-tou2 iu5-goan5 tiau3 koan5-koan5, chit8-sut-a2 to bo5 chhe7-ke7 e5 hian7-siong7, chhu3-thau5-ke a-po5 kian3-pai2 khoann3 tioh8 i, long2 e7 ka7 liam7--nng7-ku3-a2, kong2 tioh8-ai3 khah kut-lat8 kiann5--leh, gin2-a2 chiah e7 khah ho2 senn; po2-iok8-hng5 hit-koa2 chhoa7 gin2-a2 chhoa7 chhut chhu3-bi7 e5 ou-ba2-sang2, koh-khah tui3 i e5 pak-tou2 u7 chhu3-bi7, tak8-pai2 na7 khoann3 tioh8 Bi2-hong5, it-teng7 e7 mng7 kong2, iau2 koh joa7 ku2 chiah beh senn, soa3--loh8-lai5 , koh lai5 ka7 Bi2-hong5 e5 pak-tou2 bong-bong so-so--leh chiah kam-goan7, lian5 hit kui2 e5 lau7-su ma7 kang7-khoan2, hai7 goa2 tiann7-tiann7 khia7 ti7 pinn--a2, m7 chai si7 ai3 chhap-chhui3 ah si7 mai3 chiah ho2.

Koh-khah an2-choann2 講，chit kai2 m7是ti7 ka-ti7 e5所在生kiann2，厝--nih e5人無法tou7 tau3-sann-kang7，in tiann7-tiann7會kha3電話來問情形siann2款，是生--a iah是iau2-boe7。結果，等a7等，預產日12月18到--a，猶原tiam7-chhuh-chhuh，「Chiah過1工nia5，無要緊！」Goa2 an2-ne ka7美虹講，ma7 ka7 ka-ti7安慰。

Koh-khah an2-choann2 kong2, chit kai2 m7 si7 ti7 ka-ti7 e5 sou2-chai7 senn-kiann2, chhu3--nih e5 lang5 bo5 hoat-tou7 tau3-sann-kang7, in tiann7-tiann7 e7 kha3 tian7-oe7 lai5 mng7 cheng5-heng5 siann2 khoan2, si7 senn--a iah si7 iau2-boe7. Kiat-ko2, tan2 a7 tan2, i7-san2-jit8 12 goeh8 18 kau3--a, iu5-goan5 tiam7-chhuh-chhuh, “Chiah koe3 chit8 kang nia5, bo5 iau3-kin2!” Goa2 an2-ne ka7 Bi2-hong5 kong2, ma7 ka7 ka-ti7 an-ui3.

M7-koh 1工過1工，soah感覺時間過kah愈來愈慢。本底若等goa2暗時下課tng2--來，就算半暝冷ki-ki e5霜風teh吹，i ma7願意kap goa2去外口bong2散步，2 e5人na2行na2 pho3-tau7，看an2-ne是m7是真正會khah好生？ Siang2知時間拖1-e7久--來，i連che最後e5手段ma7放棄，等預產日過beh oa2 1禮拜--a，goa2 soah看tioh8 i kui-khi3 to2 ti7眠床頂看電視，表情看--來lan2-lan2-a2，頂pai2產檢e5時，病院e5先生有交帶，後禮拜若koh iau2-boe7生，tioh8-ai3直接toa3院，用催生--e5 chiah有法tou7--a。聽人講，用催生--e5會ke khah艱苦，美虹驚疼，一定真無願意變做chit種結局。

M7-koh chit8 kang koe3 chit8 kang, soah kam2-kak si5-kan koe3 kah ju2 lai5 ju2 ban7. Pun2-te2 na7 tan2 goa2 am3-si5 ha7-kho3 tng2--lai5, to7 sng3 poann3-me5 leng2-ki-ki e5 sng-hong teh chhoe, i ma7 goan7-i3 kap goa2 khi3 goa7-khau2 bong2 san3-pou7, 2 e5 lang5 na2 kiann5 na2 pho3-tau7, khoann3 an2-ne si7 m7 si7 chin-chiann3 e7 khah ho2 senn? Siang2 chai si5-kan thoa chit8-e7 ku2--lai5, i lian5 che choe3-au7 e5 chhiu2-toann7 ma7 hong3-khi3, tan2 i7-san2-jit8 koe3 beh oa2 chit8 le2-pai3--a, goa2 soah khoann3 tioh8 i kui-khi3 to2 ti7 bin5-chhng5-teng2 khoann3 tian7-si7, piau2-cheng5 khoann3--lai5 lan2-lan2-a2, teng2-pai2 san2-kiam2 e5 si5, penn7-inn7 e5 sian-sian2 u7 kau-tai3, au7 le2-pai3 na7 koh iau2-boe7 senn, tioh8-ai3 tit8-chiap toa3-inn7, iong7 chhui-senn--e5 chiah u7 hoat-tou7--a. Thiann lang5 kong2, iong7 chhui-senn--e5 e7 ke khah kan-khou2, Bi2-hong5 kiann thiann3, it-teng7 chin bo5 goan7-i3 pian3-cho3 chit chiong2 kiat-kiok8.

12月25到--a，美虹e5腹tou2 iau2 koh tiam7-tiam7，hou7 goan2有1 e5 chiok平安e5平安暝。想be7到，hit暝3更半暝chiah睏，tng好眠soah hou7人hiong5-hiong5搖cheng-sin5，目chiu bui-bui看--1-e7，美虹teh ka7 goa2 chhong3-ti7？ Iau2 be7赴開嘴叫i mai3鬧--a，i顛倒先ka7 goa2講時間差不多--a，ai3準備出門--a。Goa2頭殼hoe-sa3-sa3，1時m7知i e5意思，看tioh8 i teh款toa3院e5衫a2褲，chiah知iann2是gin2-a2 teh ka7 i催--a。

12 goeh8 25 kau3--a, Bi2-hong5 e5 pak-tou2 iau2 koh tiam7-tiam7, hou7 goan2 u7 chit8 e5 chiok peng5-an e5 peng5-an-me5. Siunn7 be7 kau3, hit me5 sann-kenn poann3-me5 chiah khun3, tng ho2-bin5 soah hou7 lang5 hiong5-hiong5 io5 cheng-sin5, bak8-chiu bui-bui khoann3--chit8-e7, Bi2-hong5 teh ka7 goa2 chhong3-ti7? Iau2 be7-hu3 khui-chhui3 kio3 i mai3 nau7--a, i tian-to3 seng ka7 goa2 kong2 si5-kan chha-put-to--a, ai3 chun2-pi7 chhut-mng5--a. Goa2 thau5-khak hoe-sa3-sa3, chit8-si5 m7 chai i e5 i3-su3, khoann3 tioh8 i teh khoan2 toa3-inn7 e5 sann-a2-khou3, chiah chai-iann2 si7 gin2-a2 teh ka7 i chhui--a.

I講2點起來ka7 a妹a2 kah被了後就無koh睏，腹tou2開始1-chun7 1-chun7 teh抽疼，ma7有出血，莫怪hit工chai2起i就感覺sian7-sian7。為beh爭取時間，無顧外口koann5 kah teh-beh結冰，人na2 chun3 na2洗身軀，等到頭鬃洗好吹ta，kap病院護士站e5小姐連絡，確定催chun7 na2來na2 chiap--a，i chiah ka7 goa2叫cheng-sin5，算--來對goa2 iau2 koh be7-bai2。

I kong2 nng7 tiam2 khi2 lai5 ka7 a-me7-a2 kah-phoe7 liau2-au7 to7 bo5 koh khun3, pak-tou2 khai-si2 chit8-chun7 chit8-chun7 teh thiu-thiann3, ma7 u7 chhut-hoeh, bok8-koai3 hit kang chai2-khi2 i to7 kam2-kak sian7-sian7. Ui7 beh cheng-chhu2 si5-kan, bo5 kou3 goa7-khau2 koann5 kah teh-beh kiat-peng, lang5 na2 chun3 na2 se2 seng-khu, tan2 kau3 thau5-chang se2 ho2 chhoe ta, kap penn7-inn7 hou7-su7-cham7 e5 sio2-chia2 lian5-lok8, khak-teng7 chhui-chun7 na2 lai5 na2 chiap--a, i chiah ka7 goa2 kio3 cheng-sin5, sng3--lai5 tui3 goa2 iau2 koh be7-bai2.

Chit 2工tu2好是入冬以來siong7 kai3 koann5 e5日子，北方e5 koann5-liu5 piann3落南，半田山kha附近，tak8工差不多食暗飽，氣溫就降到零度頂e7-a2。半暝4點，2 e5人koann7 1 kha kha-bang2，頭kap am7-kun2 kiu kah kiong7 beh無路--去，手牽手，na2行na2 ha3燒氣，koann5-liu5逼近e5關係，天--nih e5星真明，連1片雲都無，goa2 koann5--人tann-a2會hiau2認e5『獵戶星座』，chit時早就m7知走tah位去，kan-tann hng7-hng7看tioh8西peng5天頂有1粒閃sih-sih e5星，ka-ti7 ti7心肝頭細細聲ka7講，拜託tioh8保庇goan2大han3細han3 long2平安--oeh！

Chit nng7 kang tu2-ho2 si7 jip8-tang i2-lai5 siong7 kai3 koann5 e5 jit8-chi2, pak-hong e5 koann5-liu5 piann3 loh8 lam5, Poann3-tian5-soann-kha hu7-kin7, tak8-kang chha-put-to chiah8-am3 pa2, khi3-un to7 kang3 kau3 leng5-tou7 teng2-e7-a2. Siang2知tu2出門就tu2 tioh8困難，kui台車e5外殼早就結1-ian5霜冰，坐入去車內，頭前siann2都看無，ham7洗車窗a2 e5 phun3水孔都kian凍，落車用巾a2 luh-luh--leh，chiah會tang3順利起行。心內chiah teh怪奇，kam2講chit e5猴gin2-a2 iau2-boe7出世，就chiah gau5蹧躂老pe7老母？

Sim-lai7 chiah teh koai3-ki5, kam2 kong2 chit e5 kau5-gin2-a2 iau2-boe7 chhut-si3, to7 chiah gau5 chau-that lau7-pe7 lau7-bo2?

來到病院，值班e5護士小姐看--來等goan2有--1-khun3-a，隨ka7美虹liah8入去做檢查，chiah知i senn-mng5開4 chainn2--a，i隨ka7美虹安排ti7 1間產房，叫i先ti7產台面頂to2 leh hioh-khun3，na2 ka7做催chun7 kap gin2-a2心跳e5超音波測定，goa2 chit-chun7 chiah頭1 pai2知iann2，tang時a2 gin2-a2 e5心跳hiah-ni7緊，1分鐘teh-beh到180 e7。美虹e5催chun7 na2來na2 bat8，chit-chun7 goa2 kan-tann會tang3 ui3 i面容e5表情，加減知iann2 i有joa7艱苦。

Lai5 kau3 penn7-inn7, tit8-pan e5 hou7-su7 sio2-chia2 khoann3--lai5 tan2 goan2 u7--chit8-khun3-a, sui5 ka7 Bi2-hong5 liah8 jip8 khi3 cho3 kiam2-cha, chiah chai i senn-mng5 khui si3 chainn2--a, i sui5 ka7 Bi2-hong5 an-pai5 ti7 chit8 keng san2-pang5, kio3 i seng ti7 san2-tai5 bin7-teng2 to2 leh hioh-khun3, na2 ka7 cho3 chhui-chun7 kap gin2-a2 sim-thiau3 e5 chhiau-im-pho chhek-teng7, goa2 chit-chun7 chiah thau5 chit8 pai2 chai-iann2, tang-si5-a2 gin2-a2 e5 sim-thiau3 hiah-ni7 kin2, chit8 hun-cheng teh-beh kau3 180 e7. Bi2-hong5 e5 chhui-chun7 na2 lai5 na2 bat8, chit-chun7 goa2 kan-tann e7-tang3 ui3 i bin7-iong5 e5 piau2-cheng5, ke-kiam2 chai-iann2 i u7 joa7 kan-khou2.

雖bong2 tak8-e5 long2講第2 e5 gin2-a2會khah好生，m7-koh若to3-tng2來想beh生Gi5-lian5 hit當chun7，美虹ti7婦產科long2總疼beh 1工tah-tah，chit kai2 e5情形到底會an2-choann2？ Ka-ti7心內iau2是半猜疑。顛倒是美虹看--起-來老神在在，都拖過hiah che7工--a，i知iann2 che是最後階段--a，koh拚--1-e7，就會tang3結束10月日來，2人3-kha sio依oa2 e5艱苦日子。Goa2看tioh8 i e5面lioh8-lioh8-a2反紅，雖bong2有時a2嘴齒根硬咬--leh，忍耐1-chun7 koh 1-chun7 na2海湧tinn7-lau5 hit款苦疼，i看--來soah特別sui2。

Sui-bong2 tak8-e5 long2 kong2 te7-ji7 e5 gin2-a2 e7 khah ho2 senn, m7-koh na7 to3-tng2 lai5 siunn7 beh senn Gi5-lian5 hit tang-chun7, Bi2-hong5 ti7 hu7-san2-kho long2-chong2 thiann3 beh chit8 kang tah-tah, chit kai2 e5 cheng5-heng5 tau3-te2 e7 an2-choann2? Tian-to3 si7 Bi2-hong5 khoann3--khi2-lai5 lau7-sin5-chai7-chai7, to thoa koe3 hiah che7 kang--a, i chai-iann2 che si7 choe3-au7 kai-toann7--a, koh piann3--chit8-e7, to7 e7-tang3 kiat-sok 10 goeh8-jit8 lai5, nng7 lang5 sann kha sio i-oa2 e5 kan-khou2 jit8-chi2. Goa2 khoann3 tioh8 i e5 bin7 lioh8-lioh8-a2 hoan2-ang5, sui-bong2 u7 si5-a2 chhui3-khi2-kin nge7 ka7--leh, jim2-nai7 chit8-chun7 koh chit8-chun7 na2 hai2-eng2 tinn7-lau5 hit khoan2 khou2-thiann3, i khoann3--lai5 soah tek8-piat8 sui2.

Siunn7 be7 kau3 i oe7-boe2 iau2-boe7 kong2 soah, Bi2-hong5 to7 in3 kong2: “Bo5--lah!” Kui2-a7 goeh8-jit8 cheng5, i to7 bat mng7 goa2 kang7-khoan2 e5 bun7-te5, goa2 to7-si7 an2-ne in3--e5.
